C

changeDirection(String) - Method in class snakes.game.Snake
Changes the direction of a snake into a new direction set by this method.
changeHeadToBody(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
This method takes care of the image of the snake as it moves across the game board.
checkFinish(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
This method checks where the snake is on the game board and acts according to its status.
checkForSnake(Snake, Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Snake
Checks to see if there is a collision with each of the player's heads in the other player's bodies.
checkForSnake(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Snake
Checks to see if there is a collision of the snake's head with its own body.
checkMove() - Method in class snakes.game.Snake
Checks to see if the snake is out of bounds of the game's borders.
clear() - Method in class snakes.game.View
This method clears the View and resets the game.
col() - Method in class snakes.game.RowCol
This final method returns the col's coordinate.
Controller - Class in snakes.game
The controller for a snake puzzle game.
Controller() - Constructor for class snakes.game.Controller
Initializes the controller so that it has no model and no view.
